You may use this object to display your own AR experience.

# arSession

**Instance Property**

An object that manages an ARKit session.

## Declaration

```swift
var arSession: ARSession
```

## Discussion

You may use this object to display your own AR experience.

[doc://com.apple.RoomPlan/documentation/RoomPlan/RoomCaptureSession] sets this property at initialization and throws an error if your app attempts to set a value.
title: arSession
